trigger_event: A whistleblower offers Rada proof of Council crimes or access to Halden’s lost prediction engine—she must decide which truth to bring into the light.
dilemma: Rada must choose: publish proof of the Council’s darkest abuses, risking chaos, or help restart the last system that can restore peace—even if it suppresses the city’s creative voices.
reason: The city teeters between uprising and exhaustion—one path means truth and uproar, the other, fragile calm but silent conformity. Rada knows either choice will change Stenograd forever.
choice_a: Expose the hidden digital ledger, unleashing evidence of historic disappearances and abuses, forcing reckoning regardless of consequences.
belief_a: Truth must be prioritized over comfort.
Real healing begins with facing uncomfortable facts.
Power must be held accountable, no matter the price.
choice_b: Help quietly revive Halden’s prediction engine, enabling the Innovators to restore order but at the cost of spontaneity and dissent.
belief_b: Stability and safety must come first.
People crave relief from fear and chaos.
Once peace is restored, reform can follow.
